item.title: Decorate functions using macros in Elixir
item.description: After I decided to make public a telegram bot to monitor bus time in Dublin (@dublin_bus_bot). Before the release I became curious to see how many people will use it (spoiler: just an handful) and I thought that would be a good idea to track the use on google analytics. Overview Google analytics provide a measurement protocol that can be used to track things that are different from websites (mobile apps, IOT).
